questions.question: What does VB.NET stand for?
Which of the following is the extension of a VB.NET source file?
How do you declare multiple variables of the same type in one line?
options: a) Dim x, y, z As Integer
c) Dim x As Integer, y As Integer, z As Integer
questions.correct_answer: a) Dim x, y, z As Integer
questions.code: Dim x, y, z As Integer

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Option Explicit statement?
Which of these is NOT a valid VB.NET data type?
What is the difference between Dim, Static, and Const?
options: a) Dim for variables, Static for procedure-level persistence, Const for constants
b) Dim for dynamic, Static for fixed, Const for read-only
d) Dim for public, Static for private, Const for protected
questions.correct_answer: a) Dim for variables, Static for procedure-level persistence, Const for constants

questions.question: How do you create a single-line comment in VB.NET?
questions.code: ' This is a comment

questions.question: What does the MsgBox function do?
options: b) Displays a dialog with message
questions.code: MsgBox("Hello, World!")

questions.question: What are modules in VB.NET?
options: b) Similar to classes but don't need instantiation

questions.question: What is the purpose of the Imports statement?
options: b) To avoid full namespace qualification
questions.code: Imports System.Data

questions.question: What is the difference between ByVal and ByRef?
options: a) ByVal passes value, ByRef passes reference
b) ByRef modifies original, ByVal doesn't
d) ByVal is faster than ByRef

questions.question: When should you use a Structure instead of a Class?
options: b) When you need value semantics

questions.question: What is the correct Try-Catch-Finally syntax?
options: c) Try ... Catch ... Finally ... End Try
questions.correct_answer: c) Try ... Catch ... Finally ... End Try
questions.code:
Try
    ' Code
Catch ex As Exception
    ' Handle error
Finally
    ' Cleanup
End Try

questions.question: What is the scope of Friend access modifier?
How do you define a property with getter and setter?
options: b) With Get and Set blocks
questions.code:
Private _name As String
Public Property Name As String
    Get
        Return _name
    End Get
    Set(value As String)
        _name = value
    End Set
End Property

questions.question: What does the Me keyword refer to?
What's the difference between Function and Sub?
options: a) Function returns value, Sub doesn't
c) Function must have return type
questions.code:
Function Add(a As Integer, b As Integer) As Integer
    Return a + b
End Function

Sub Show(msg As String)
    Console.WriteLine(msg)
End Sub

questions.question: How do you declare an array of 10 integers?
questions.code: Dim numbers(9) As Integer ' Indexes 0-9

questions.question: What's the difference between For and For Each?
options: a) For uses counter, For Each iterates collections
b) For Each is only for arrays
c) For is faster than For Each
questions.correct_answer: a) For uses counter, For Each iterates collections
questions.code:
For Each item In myList
    Console.WriteLine(item)
Next

For i As Integer = 0 To 9
    Console.WriteLine(i)
Next

questions.question: How do you connect to SQL Server?
questions.code: Dim conn As New SqlConnection("Server=myServer;Database=myDB;User Id=myUser;Password=myPass;")

questions.question: What are the four pillars of OOP in VB.NET?
What is polymorphism in VB.NET?
options: a) Same method name with different implementations

questions.question: Difference between abstract classes and interfaces?
options: a) Abstract can have implementation, interfaces can't
b) Class can inherit one abstract class but multiple interfaces

questions.question: How do you create a thread?
questions.code:
Dim t As New Thread(AddressOf MyMethod)
t.Start()

questions.question: What are delegates in VB.NET?
How does garbage collection work?
options: d) Only works with Using statement

questions.question: When should you use the Using statement?
questions.code:
Using conn As New SqlConnection(connString)
    conn.Open()
End Using

questions.question: What is a lambda expression?
questions.code: Dim square = Function(x As Integer) x * x

questions.question: How do you create a Windows Forms app?
What is the My namespace for?
options: a) Simplified access to common features

What is Select Case used for?
questions.code:
Select Case value
    Case 1
        ' Do something
    Case 2
        ' Do something else
End Select

questions.question: How do you skip to next iteration?
What is an array?

options: b) Dim arr As Integer() = New Integer() {1, 2, 3}
questions.code: Dim numbers() As Integer = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}

questions.question: How do you resize an array?
questions.code: ReDim Preserve myArray(10)

questions.question: What is a jagged array?
options: b) Each element can be different size
questions.code: Dim jagged()() As Integer = {New Integer() {1}, New Integer() {2,3}}

questions.question: What namespace contains collections?
Which follows LIFO order?
How do you add to an ArrayList?
questions.code:
Dim list As New ArrayList()
list.Add("Item")

questions.question: What is List(Of T)?
questions.code:
Dim names As New List(Of String)
names.Add("Alice")

questions.code: If myDict.ContainsKey("name") Then

questions.code: Function Add(a As Integer, b As Integer) As Integer

questions.question: How return from Function?
questions.code: Return result

questions.question: Can Sub return value?
Write a Function to add two numbers
options: b) Function Add(a,b) As Integer Return a+b
questions.correct_answer:
b) Function Add(a As Integer, b As Integer) As Integer
    Return a + b
End Function
questions.code:
Function Add(a As Integer, b As Integer) As Integer
    Return a + b
End Function

questions.question: How call a Sub?
questions.code:
ShowMessage("Hello")
' Or:
Call ShowMessage("Hello")

questions.question: Optional parameters?
questions.code: Function Multiply(a As Integer, Optional b As Integer = 1) As Integer
